skillTree.localised_description: There are none more adept at metal-shaping than those who command the runes.
All Dwarfs despise the Greenskins, for the urki and grobi are the prime agents in the Times of Woe.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Greenskins

skillTree.localised_description: Dwarfs are resolute - once they commit to charging the foe, they put all their strength behind that initial blow.
The endless courage of the Warrior God, directed to bolster this Dawi’s own reserves.
Dwarfs are not fast, yet they will soldier on, always moving despite any hazards encountered.
Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: True experience is born only on the battlefield.

effects.description:
Armour: +1 for all units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Hero's army)

Armour: +3 for all units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Hero's army)

Armour: +5 for all units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Hero's army)
Overcast Rune Magic: "Master Rune of Speed"
Overcast Rune Magic: "Master Rune of Speed"
Overcast Rune Magic: "Master Rune of Oath & Steel"
Overcast Rune Magic: "Master Rune of Oath & Steel"

target_if: Not on or below a platform

effects.description: Overcast Rune Magic: "Master Rune of Wrath & Ruin"

target_if: Not on or below a platform

effects.description: Overcast Rune Magic: "Master Rune of Wrath & Ruin"

target_if: Not on or below a platform

skillTree.localised_description: The Dwarfs' natural anti-magic resistance is amplified to dampen the Winds of Magic.

effects.description:
Enemy Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: -10
	(enemy armies in region)
Overcast Rune Magic: "Master Rune of Slowness"
Overcast Rune Magic: "Master Rune of Slowness"
Overcast Rune Magic: "Master Rune of Breaking"
Overcast Rune Magic: "Master Rune of Breaking"
Overcast Rune Magic: "Master Rune of Negation"
Overcast Rune Magic: "Master Rune of Negation"

skillTree.localised_description: Invoking the Rune of Hearth & Home stirs a Dwarf's pride in his Hold, Clan and Ancestors.

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

skillTree.localised_description: Dawi Rune Magic is potent, and damned hard to defend against!
A Runesmith may "strike the runes" - an analogy for keeping them "hot", refusing to let them cool.

effects.description: Shared cooldown: -10% for all Rune Magic

skillTree.localised_description: The power of this rune undermines the armour worn by the enemies of the Dawi.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
Full-plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
This rune provides the Runesmith with resistance to flame.
Look at the wee wizards cower in their boots.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: -5
	(enemy armies in province)

skillTree.localised_description: Casting spells in the presence of a Runesmith skilled enough to have mastered the use of this rune is risky to say the least.

effects.description:
Enemy miscast base chance: +2%
	(enemy armies in region)

Enemy miscast base chance: +4%
	(enemy armies in region)

Enemy miscast base chance: +6%
	(enemy armies in region)

skillTree.localised_description: They say he brings misfortune to those who oppose the throng...

effects.description:
Enemy physical resistance: -1%
	(enemy armies in region)

Enemy physical resistance: -2%
	(enemy armies in region)

Enemy physical resistance: -3%
	(enemy armies in region)

skillTree.localised_description: Ensuring that your weapon is always in tip-top shape isn’t an easy job. This old-timer knows a couple of handy tricks that will make it simpler, and he’s always willing to share.
Even a dwarf must sometimes admit when they're in the presence of somebody they should be happy to learn from.
Valaya's rune provides the wearer with vigour, and protects all Dawi from corruption.
Alright now, no excuses; get at them! (This skill line is Belegar campaign only)
Perhaps by some gift of Grungni, when a Runesmith feels the rage of battle his throng’s weapons glow with the heat of the forgefires.

effects.description: Sharpen Weapons action: missile and melee damage is increased by an additional 3%
Sharpen Weapons action: missile and melee damage is increased by an additional 5%

skillTree.localised_description: Spellcasters can oft-sense when magic is close or being drawn from the Winds.

effects.description: Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 5%
Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 10%
Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.localised_description: The locals take notice and will be inspired or frightened into action.

effects.description: Cleanse Corruption action: Corruption is reduced by an additional 1
Cleanse Corruption action: Corruption is reduced by an additional 2
Cleanse Corruption action: Corruption is reduced by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: They cannot stop what they cannot see.

effects.description: Damage Walls action: 1 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 2 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 3 additional wall breaches

skillTree.localised_description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 12% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 21% chance of wounding target

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of a powerful figure extolling death and blasphemies can bring enemy ranks to their knees.

effects.description: Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -10%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -20%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -40%

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit does not suffer any form of leadership loss and will never rout.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
Even when performing the most fatiguing actions, this unit never loses vigour.
Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.
Entities with this attribute ignore the effects of enemy contact effects such as  Poison

nodes.localised_description: I forged many fine runes in life. I do not give them away lightly.

effects.description:
Casualty replenishment rate: +10% for Rangers units
	(own armies factionwide)

nodes.localised_description: There are no 'weaknesses' in Dwarven armour design, only weak warriors. That said, these runes will help protect the most common areas of struggle.

effects.description:
Armour: +5 for Rangers units
	(own armies factionwide)

nodes.localised_description: It is a true honour to be in this ancestor's presence.
Dwarven stone suffers neither flame nor foul magic.
The Dammaz Kron contains many heinous grudges, but none so terrible as the loss of Karak Eight Peaks.
